alert.note: Alert for Cass; Northern Berrien; Southern Berrien (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS NorthernIndiana (Northern Indiana and Northeastern Ohio)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued November 20 at 2:49AM EST until November 20 at 7:00AM EST by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 AM EST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Heavy lake effect snow and areas of blowing snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 6 inches. Winds gusting as high as 30 mph. Wind chills in the single digits. * WHERE...Cass MI, St. Joseph MI, and Berrien Counties. * WHEN...through early Sunday morning. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery, snow covered roads. Areas of blowing snow and heavy snow will significantly reduce visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Lake effect snow will diminish toward sunrise.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency.
